TopicTitle: RSS - Testing 'cheaper' Mars Colinisation delivery methods

Articles.Content:
Delivery by parachute and RCS power ( I think I'll also add some wheels later ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

Parachutes kicking in - a further development of FASA Mercury chutes

![XNatMBM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XNatMBM.jpg)

Stabilising the descent..

![NDeTzzK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NDeTzzK.jpg)

Just a well we can test from the 'comfy chair' of home ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Took a few times to get it right - I should have retracted the gear and rolled it over with SAS/RCS.. next time!

![a3h1vx1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/a3h1vx1.jpg)

Finally... back to the drawing board.

![SaGFXaF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SaGFXaF.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T10:05:30Z" title="05/31/2015 10:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**

A few changes later.. and a perfect descent and landing... ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

![RLac1H4.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RLac1H4.jpg)

Lots of testing before the final flight...

She may look dumpy!!, but she flies like a graceful bird..![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

![lLFdSSZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lLFdSSZ.jpg)
